thread.section_title: Hotel Saint-Marc - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location. Luxuory service.
thread.title_full: Excellent location. Luxuory service. - Review of Hotel Saint-Marc, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: rikf0
title: Excellent location. Luxuory service.
text:
The Hotel is situated close to the Opera and everything is easily reachable.
Staff is extremely professional and helpful.
Rooms are luxurious and not tiny. They have a great spa which you can book for an hour privately. there is also a hospitality bar where you can find the drinks you need.
